column1: #text=After a long day of work I decided to take a bath .
#text=First I put on some good relaxing acoustic music to listen to while I took the bath .
#text=Then I got the water nice and hot and then stopped the drain .
#text=After the tub was full I added lavender bubbles .
#text=I got a tray to place across the bath with my wine and a magazine and some chocolate .
#text=I sank into the water and sighed with relief .
#text=I drank three glasses of wine and haphazardly paged through the magazine .
#text=When I was done with my bath I pulled the plug and drained the water .
#text=Then I turned on the shower to rinse myself off .
#text=Once all the soap was off I stepped out .
#text=I dried off and then put on my robe .
#text=I was now done taking a bath and was ready for bed .
